channel.title: Favorite year in RS2?
channel.description:
What is your favorite year in RuneScape?
Vote, then explain what year you chose and why :D

item.title: Favorite year in RS2?
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

i started rsps in 06’ i had started runescape in 04’ and i was about 9/10 so 2006 was my favorite

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite year in RS2?
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:2, topic:336872”]2007,the time rs was perfect.
-Original grapchics
-No d claws
-Good pking
-Alot of botters(was fun to kill them)
-RWT
-Good weekly updates
-No summoning or dungeoneering
-No trade limit
Well basicly any year before 2008 was good.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite year in RS2?

item.description:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:29, topic:336872”]Date Offence Type Site Expires Status Action Evidence
19-Jan-2006 Manual Permanent Ban Ban RuneScape N/A Appeal Denied Why? None

Best year ever![/quote]I don’t even see how the can happen LOL.

item.title: Favorite year in RS2?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:35, topic:336872”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=433287.msg3181474#msg3181474 date=1271356234]

2006, first worse update was wilderness ditch and everything got worse…

I never really got why they put that there.
[/quote]

They put it there because ‘noobs’ were getting lured into the wilderness because they didn’t know they could be attacked there - The wilderness ditch made it so it warned you can people could attack you when you crossed it.[/quote]
Thats when all this bullshit money for items shit started. like $4 for 200k. cause people coudnt pk properly for cash

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite year in RS2?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Rixxx, post:1, topic:336907”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=433287.msg3181301#msg3181301 date=1271335404]

[quote author=Mitko link=topic=433287.msg3181293#msg3181293 date=1271334736]

[quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=433287.msg3181279#msg3181279 date=1271334255]

Because this isn’t RuneScape, you idiot?.. Do you even know the difference between a fucking massive dinosaur and a tiny kitten, teh_codex?

MoparScape > RuneScape

That’s a terrible comparison.
[/quote]

RuneScape > Moparscape
maybe if we had less trolls then mopar wudda been better.
[/quote]Lol go look at Rants board in rs forums, it’s full with trolls and spammers.
[/quote]we still have more then them

woah internet badass you so are cool a doesn’t mistake of anything[/quote]
